item.title: Photo - We had fun today on the levee’s. Less than two weeks out for your chance to ride across the Mississippi with a police escort and catch a ferry back across the river all on your bike!

item.title: Thanks to the 20 or so riders that came out for the ChilieWillie ride today! A great turnout for an amazing springlike day in January. See everyone again next week at 10.
item.description: Thanks to the 20 or so riders that came out for the ChilieWillie ride today! A great turnout for an amazing springlike day in January. See everyone again next week at 10.
item.author: FBRSS.com

item.title: You want options? We have you covered...
item.description:
You want options? We have you covered...

Bike Surgeon

Are you ready for the Cannonball rides? Let us help ya out a bit and come ride with us this Saturday from the Outpost in Edwardsville. We will roll out at 8am and hit the MCT trails to Alhambra and back. Total of around 30 miles on mostly chat trail with a place to refill bottles and get a snack in Alhambra. This will be Out and Back with a solid B group pace, but if you want to do your own thing that's cool still come out and start with us. There will be chili waiting for us when we return, not Josh's world famous but probably better! Let's ride!
item.author: FBRSS.com

item.title: The weatherman says 40 on Saturday morning at 8! Mo says ride. Join him at 8 or jump on the train at 10, then swing by for some of Josh's world famous chili!
item.description: The weatherman says 40 on Saturday morning at 8! Mo says ride. Join him at 8 or jump on the train at 10, then swing by for some of Josh's world famous chili!
item.author: FBRSS.com

item.title:
It's happening again, a winter celebration of all things mountain biking, Thursday, February 15th at Ballpark Village in downtown St. Louis from 6-10PM.

A FUN night of viewings on the BIG screen and other cool events; another exclusive viewing courtesy of Red Bull Media House. AND this years world premier of the short "Riding Dirty 3" highlighting the Southern Illinois Fat Tire Festival 2017 and the O'Face Race.

Virtual indoor MTB rides, Fat Bike Log Ride Challenge, meet and greet with: Gateway Off-Road Cyclists Representatives, Terrain Magazine - St. Louis Publisher, and many others. Check out some of the latest bikes, gear and other MTB industry coolness. As usual the best deal of the year on registrations for Southern Illinois Fat Tire Festival 2018, will be on for just this one night! All of this capped off with some great drinks and food with friends at Ball Park Village!
